response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, which I believe is worth $1,200,000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special price. Considering its unique features and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose to sell it to you for $1,150,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I trust that this price reflects the true worth of the product while also allowing me to achieve my goal of maximizing the return on this valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1150000}
